code: import React from'react';import'./Scrollup.css';function Scrollup(){window.addEventListener("scroll",function(){const scrollUp=document.querySelector(".scrollup");if(this.scrollY>=560)scrollUp.classList.add("show-scroll");else scrollUp.classList.remove("show-scroll");});return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("a",{href:"#home",className:"scrollup"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("i",{className:"uil uil-arrow-up scrollup_icon"}));}export default Scrollup;
